question: 「(A) I wake up. (B) I eat breakfast. (C) I go to school.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) She opened the book. (B) She read it. (C) She closed it.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) It started to rain. (B) We took out umbrellas. (C) We went home.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) Tom cooked dinner. (B) We ate together. (C) We washed dishes.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) She bought a ticket. (B) She got on the bus. (C) She arrived at work.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) I turned on the TV. (B) I watched the news. (C) I turned it off.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) They met at the cafe. (B) They talked for an hour. (C) They said goodbye.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) I did my homework. (B) I played video games. (C) I went to bed.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) She put on her coat. (B) She opened the door. (C) She went outside.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) He studied hard. (B) He took the test. (C) He passed.」を正しい順番に並べると？
